column3: utACK thanks! I think this would only apply to the genesis block, right? Which would never be `THRESHOLD_STARTED`... I don't know if that `pindex==NULL` code will ever run actually.
Or maybe just initialize the stats object with an = {}?

I see no problem in:
 - moving all default values to `BIP9Stats` constructor, or
 - moving these up even if they are overwritten below.
